Entries.MorrisTod: Ah! A gift worthy of my attention. Thank you, @./730 727 432 578/This is delightful!/72 348 430 428/I don't like this.../346 459 303 -81/What a despicable gift. Get this away from me./167 -74/That's generous of you./-75 -79 -80/
Those Joja gift cards just may provide the store with more loyal customers!$1

BeforeMovie.Text: Ah, @. This film in particular strikes my interest! Shall we procure seats?$1

AfterMovie.Text: I felt youthful again watching that film! Certainly a gratifying experience!$1

BeforeMovie.Text: Thank you for inviting me to the cinema, @. Best to get use out of the theater you paid for.$1

AfterMovie.Text: That film presented a... unique perspective. Perahps I should follow it by example?$0

BeforeMovie.Text: It's good to present yourself at the cinema, @. Everyone knows you single-handely paid for the establishment!$1

DuringMovie.Text: Haha! Quite the show this is!$1

AfterMovie.Text: Well, I must say that was quite entertaining. Until next time, @.$0

BeforeMovie.Text: After the countless hours I've put into work, I'm looking forward to this delightful film.$0

AfterMovie.Text: A magnificent film that certainly was. Thank you for the invite.$1

BeforeMovie.Text: Ah, yes. I've heard... poor reviews of this movie but never had the chance to inspect it yet...$0

DuringMovie.Text: What. No! That makes no sense!$3

AfterMovie.Text: I will look into removing this movie from the master show list. Can't have poor films ruining our establishment!$3

Another Joja customer gained!$5"/pause 200/move Morris 0 1 2/pause 300/emote Morris 40/pause 150/faceDirection Morris 3/pause 150/emote Morris 16 true/pause 200/speak Morris "*Ahem*...$4#$b#Shop at Joja!$1#$b#Cheaper seeds than Pierre's!$5#$b#Special limited-time discounts and rewards!$1"/pause 400/move Morris 6 0 1 true/pause 200/textAboveHead Morris "Hahaha!"/pause 600/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/halt/end dialogue Pierre "*sigh*...Morris keeps driving away my customers.$2#$e#What will I do?...$2"

Entries.6663409/k 191393/w sunny/y 1/z spring/z: springtown/-500 -500/farmer 88 89 0 Morris 89 53 3 Lewis 87 53 1 Abigail 82 35 1 Caroline 106 65 3 Clint 97 77 0 Evelyn 62 57 0/pause 500/viewport 88 53 true/skippable/move farmer 0 -33 0 true/pause 800/speak Morris "I guarantee there is nothing to be worried about, Mayor.$1"/pause 200/speak Lewis "But there is, Morris. Robin's house was struck by several rocks when the landslide was cleared.$3#$b#Susan was shocked by the blast. She wasn't informed of the operation unti-$2"/speak Morris "Everything is under control and will be fine, Mayor.$4"/speak Lewis "And what of the garbage Joja dumps into the river, Morris?$0#$b#Willy, our local fisherman, says he's catching Joja CD's and cola cans.$3"/speak Morris "Might I remind you pursuant to init. R27.01, JojaCo Amendment, Joja's operations here in Stardew Valley are fully compliant with the law.$1"/pause 600/faceDirection Lewis 2/pause 250/faceDirection Morris 2/pause 350/speak Lewis "Ah, hello @.$0#$b#I was... just on my way.$3"/pause 500/faceDirection Lewis 1/pause 300/faceDirection Morris 3/pause 1000/faceDirection Lewis 3/pause 600/speak Lewis "Good day, Morris.$3"/pause 500/move Lewis -8 0 3 true/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 400/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 400/halt/warp Lewis -100 -100/viewport 88 53 true/pause 1200/faceDirection Morris 2/pause 300/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 400/speak Morris "Joja is paving a way to greatness in Stardew Valley.$0"/pause 400/move Morris -1 0 2/move Morris 0 1 2/pause 700/speak Morris "It's only a matter of time until we are all united under Joja.$5"/pause 200/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/stopMusic/pause 1000/message "I should go talk to Lewis."/pause 600/end dialogue Lewis "It's difficult reaching resolutions with Morris.$0#$b#Whenever he feels pressured, he asserts legislation which is obviously the result of Joja's influence.$2#$e#Just because something is the law doesn't mean it's right. Bein' Mayor isn't always daisies and sunshine.$0#$e#I enjoy your spirit, @! It's refreshing to see.$1"

Entries.6663501/k 191393/y 1/w sunny/t 900 1600/: playful/-500 -500/farmer -125 -125 3 Morris 31 73 0 Olivia 27 65 3 Caroline 26 66 0 Jodi 26 64 2 Pierre 47 50 1 Penny 79 46 2 Alex 53 69 0 Gus 36 69 0 Haley 52 69 0 Lewis 31 56 2 Pam 76 69 2 Victor 96 65 1 George 61 64 2/showFrame Penny 18/viewport 31 73 true/skippable/viewport move 0 -2 4000 true/move Morris 0 -8 0/pause 400/faceDirection Morris 3 true/pause 100/speak Morris "Hello, ladies! Beautiful day!$1"/pause 600/faceDirection Olivia 2 true/pause 150/faceDirection Olivia 1/pause 100/faceDirection Caroline 1 true/pause 150/emote Olivia 8 true/pause 100/emote Caroline 16 true/pause 150/faceDirection Jodi 1 true/pause 100/speak Olivia "Afternoon, Morris.$0"/speak Caroline "...$2"/pause 300/viewport move 0 -2 3000 true/move Morris 0 -6 0 true/pause 500/faceDirection Olivia 2 true/pause 150/faceDirection Olivia 3/pause 100/faceDirection Caroline 0 true/pause 150/faceDirection Jodi 2 true/pause 1300/speak Lewis "Ah, Morris. Greeting the townsfolk?$0"/speak Morris "Haha! I am! On a day as glorious as this one, how could I not?$1#$b#Keep up the good work, Mayor!$4"/speak Lewis "Err... thanks, Morris!$1"/pause 400/viewport move 2 0 9000 true/move Morris 17 0 0 true/pause 2000/textAboveHead Morris "A beautiful day it is!"/pause 3000/textAboveHead Morris "Haha!"/pause 4000/viewport move 0 -2 2500 true/move Morris 0 -5 0/move Pierre 1 0 2 true/pause 800/emote Pierre 16 true/pause 300/speak Morris "Ah! Pierre! I truly hope you're well on this beautiful day!$5"/pause 500/speak Pierre "...$2"/pause 1000/move Pierre -2 0 0/warp Pierre -100 -100/pause 600/emote Morris 40/speak Morris "...$3"/pause 700/move Morris 6 0 1 true/pause 800/stopMusic/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/warp Morris 63 53/warp Pierre 46 48/warp farmer 84 53/pause 300/playMusic springtown/viewport 73 53 true/move Morris 9 0 1 true/move farmer -9 0 3 true/pause 2500/speak Morris "Hello, @!$1#$b#Fancy meeting you by Joja Mart!$4#$b#Are you enjoying the beautiful weather today?$1"/pause 750/question fork0 "#Why are you so happy?#I suppose the weather is nice."/pause 200/fork 6663501_WhyHappy/pause 300/speak Morris "Yes! The weather most certainly is!$1#$b#I'm in a very cheerful mood today!$4#$b#Allow me the opportunity to tell you why, since you're the closest person in this town to what I'd consider a 'friend', besides Andy.$5"/pause 100/switchEvent 6663501_WhyHappy2
Entries.6663501_WhyHappy: pause 400/speak Morris "The president of Joja Corp is impressed with my work in the valley!$1#$b#Finally, I have been recognized by the higher-ups!$5#$b#I am due a promotion and raise for my collective efforts, furthering the Joja family!$4#$b#The condominium I've had my eye on is finally within my grasp.$5"/pause 500/question fork0 "#Sounds like a well deserved promotion.#Money isn't everything."/fork 6663501_MoneyIsNotEverything/pause 500/speak Morris "I have worked many days and nights to secure this advancement for my career.$4#$b#The fruits of my labor are finally paying off.$5"/pause 300/emote Morris 40/pause 150/speak Morris "Speak to me at Joja Mart. I'll give you a discount in advance.$1"/pause 300/end dialogue Morris "Hello, @! Consider this an advanced discount on your next Joja purchase![336]"
Entries.6663501_WhyHappy2: pause 400/speak Morris "The president of Joja Corp is impressed with my work in the valley!$1#$b#Finally, I have been recognized by the higher-ups!$5#$b#I am due a promotion and raise for my collective efforts, furthering the Joja family!$4#$b#The condominium I've had my eye on is finally within my grasp.$5"/pause 500/question fork1 "#Sounds like a well deserved promotion.#Money isn't everything."/fork 6663501_MoneyIsNotEverything2/pause 500/speak Morris "I have worked many days and nights to secure this advancement for my career.$4#$b#The fruits of my labor are finally paying off.$5"/pause 300/emote Morris 40/pause 150/speak Morris "Speak to me at Joja Mart. I'll give you a discount in advance.$1"/pause 300/end dialogue Morris "Hello, @! Consider this an advanced discount on your next Joja purchase![336]"
Entries.6663501_MoneyIsNotEverything: pause 100/stopMusic/pause 350/emote Morris 16 true/pause 300/speak Morris "Hahahaha!$1#$b#You put on quite the show, @. This is the very reason I enjoy your company.$0#$b#*Ahem*...$4#$b#However...$3"/pause 1000/faceDirection Morris 2/pause 1000/showFrame Morris 35/pause 800/speak Morris "I have to disagree with you on that point.$3#$b#Anything I don't have can be obtained through monetary compensation.$5#$b#Your own farm relies on maintaining a steady income, does it not? Money is important to you, even if you don't want to admit it.$0"/pause 300/move Morris 0 0 1/pause 400/emote farmer 40 true/pause 250/speak Morris "Enough talk.$3#$b#I'm off to enjoy this beautiful day, thinking of all the down payments I can make soon!$1#$b#I suggest you think about the importance money plays in your livelihood. It's important to be honest with yourself, @.$4"/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1200/message "Morris walked away, whistling a cheerful theme."/pause 800/end position 75 53

Entries.6663411/k 191393/e 6663501/t 1000 1800/f: Hospital_Ambient/-500 -500/farmer 25 16 3 Morris -100 -100 3 Shane -200 -200 0 Shane_JojaMart 13 13 3 Sam 13 17 3 Jodi 9 8 0 Andy 2 14 1/addTemporaryActor Claire 16 32 -100 -100 2 true/pause 400/viewport 14 13 true/skippable/pause 1000/move Sam 1 0 1/pause 1600/speak Shane "Ugh. I want go home already. I hate this job.$2"/pause 1000/move Sam 0 -1 1/pause 1600/speak Morris "*static* All Joja employees! Brief meeting at checkout stand three!$0"/stopAnimation Shane_JojaMart/pause 400/faceDirection Shane_JojaMart 2/pause 400/speak Shane "What is it now? Probably just more work for us to do.$5"/pause 300/faceDirection Sam 0/pause 200/speak Sam "Might be something about 'don't forget your uniform'. He already grilled me for that though.$5"/speak Shane "Let's get this over with.$2"/pause 200/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 200/warp Shane_JojaMart 11 26/warp Sam 11 24/warp Jodi 13 6/warp Andy 2 11/warp farmer 13 17/warp Morris 13 25/faceDirection Sam 1/faceDirection Shane_JojaMart 1/viewport 15 24 true/pause 1500/speak Morris "*Ahem*...$0#$b#The regional manager is arriving tomorrow to inspect the store$4.#$b#Shelves are to be fully stocked, floors scrubbed, and produce arranged in a presentable manner.$1#$b#There will be several other jobs assigned to you three throughout the day, on top of your normal tasks.$5"/speak Claire "What... no...$8"/textAboveHead Sam "Great..."/pause 1300/speak Shane "Are we gonna be paid more for any of this 'extra work'...?$2"/pause 250/speak Morris "Erm... no.$3"/pause 150/speak Shane "Tch...$5"/speak Morris "You better watch that attitude of yours. May I remind you how fast I could have you replaced?$3"/pause 300/speak Claire "I wanna go home...$8"/pause 300/speak Morris "You can after your shift. And no, for the last time, I'm not letting you cut out early.$3"/pause 300/speak Sam "...$2"/pause 1000/question fork0 "#Say something#Stay out of it"/fork 6663411_SaySomething/pause 500/emote Morris 40/pause 300/speak Morris "Well? What are you all waiting for!?$3#$b#Get to work!$5"/friendship Shane -50/friendship Sam -50/end position 13 17
Entries.6663411_SaySomething: pause 500/move farmer 0 5 2/pause 350/faceDirection Shane_JojaMart 0/pause 200/faceDirection Sam 0/pause 100/faceDirection Morris 0/pause 100/emote Morris 16 true/pause 300/speak Morris "@? How long have you been standing there?$3"/pause 1000/question fork1 "#You should be nicer to your employees.#Your employees should listen to you."/pause 100/fork 6663411_BeNiceToEmployees/pause 300/speak Sam "!!!$8"/speak Shane "You serious?$2"/faceDirection Morris 3/pause 300/faceDirection Shane_JojaMart 1/pause 150/faceDirection Sam 1/pause 200/speak Morris "Hahaha! Yes, I have to agree with @.$5#$b#You must heed my orders, or face the consequences.$1"/speak Claire "...$6"/speak Sam "Yes, sir...$5"/speak Shane "...$5"/pause 500/friendship Sam -80/friendship Shane -80/end dialogue Morris "Thank you for your assistance with my employees, @. It's tough knocking sense into those two.$1"
Entries.6663411_BeNiceToEmployees: pause 300/speak Morris "Wh-what!?$3"/pause 300/faceDirection Shane_JojaMart 1/pause 200/faceDirection Sam 1/pause 200/faceDirection Morris 3/pause 200/speak Shane "@ has a point. You're working us way too much for how little we're getting paid.$3"/pause 500/textAboveHead Sam "I agree!"/pause 1000/speak Claire "I'm so tired...$8"/pause 700/faceDirection Morris 0/pause 700/faceDirection Morris 3/pause 400/speak Morris "...$3#$b#...$2#$b#Perhaps I will look into asking my superiors about pay raises. Would that suffice?$3"/pause 300/textAboveHead Shane_JojaMart "That's a start."/pause 300/textAboveHead Sam "Totally awesome!"/pause 1000/speak Claire "Thank you, sir!$10"/pause 500/speak Morris "I'll... be on the phone.$0#$b#You four better make the store spotless. I expect results.$3"/pause 500/move Morris 7 0 1 true/pause 400/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/friendship Shane 30/friendship Sam 30/end dialogue Morris "I didn't appreciate how you forced yourself into my employee meeting, demanding pay raises.$3#$e#It did... however... suggest an alternate management strategy that could be effective.$2"

Entries.6663915/k 191393/w sunny/z winter/f Morr: spring_night_ambient/-500 -500/farmer 80 53 1 Morris 95 51 0/pause 700/viewport 95 52 true/skippable/move farmer 15 0 0 true/pause 1300/shake Morris 500/playSound openBox/pause 1500/shake Morris 400/playSound openBox/pause 800/speak Morris "My key won't work!? Defective garbage!$3"/pause 600/emote Morris 12/pause 1000/move Morris 0 0 2 true/pause 400/speak Morris "@? You're out awfully late.$0"/pause 400/move farmer 0 -1 1/move farmer 1 0 0/move farmer 0 -1 3 true/pause 350/faceDirection Morris 1 true/pause 500/emote farmer 40 true/pause 400/speak Morris "What's that? You want to try locking the door for me?$0#$b#I'm telling you, this key is a useless piece of-$3"/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 200/startJittering/playSound openBox/pause 180/playSound money/pause 350/stopJittering/pause 200/emote Morris 16 true/pause 300/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 450/speak Morris "How did you...$3#$b#Ahh. I was putting the key in at a wrong angle.$2#$b#Heh. It has been a very busy day. Nothing a good five hours of sleep can't solve!$1"/pause 1000/question fork0 "#Why are you working such long hours?#You should go home and rest."/pause 100/fork 6663915_LongHours/pause 400/speak Morris "Thank you for assisting in locking the door, @.$1#$b#If I missed the late night shuttle, I'd have to sleep at my desk again.$2#$b#Good night!$1"/pause 200/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end dialogue Morris "Almost missed my shuttle! Thank you again for your assistance, @.$1"
Entries.6663915_LongHours: pause 1000/faceDirection Morris 2/pause 700/move Morris 0 2 2 true/pause 450/faceDirection farmer 2 true/pause 1100/showFrame Morris 32/pause 1500/speak Morris "A dream doesn't become reality if one isn't prepared to put in the work. It takes determination and sacrifice.$0"/pause 1000/showFrame Morris 0/pause 800/showFrame Morris 35/pause 1100/speak Morris "Haven't you noticed we're the only two people in town up at this hour?$0#$b#We're both working towards making our dreams a reality.$1#$b#I believe Joja will make the Ferngill Republic become something greater than it is today.$4#$b#And I will continue to work towards that goal, no matter the cost to others or myself...$3"/pause 600/emote farmer 40 true/pause 250/move Morris 0 0 0/pause 250/speak Morris "I am afraid I'll have to prematurely end our conversation. I have a late night shuttle to catch.$0#$b#If I miss it, I will have to sleep at my desk again.$2#$b#Good night, @. And thank you for helping me lock the door.$0"/pause 600/move Morris -8 0 3 true/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 3 true/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/halt/pause 1200/message "Morris rushed to the bus stop in a hurry."/pause 1000/end dialogue MorrisTod "Almost missed my shuttle, but I didn't thanks to your efforts, @.$1"

Entries.6665290/J/y 2/w sunny/z winter/t 1000 18: springtown/-500 -500/farmer 54 36 0 Morris 54 25 0 Olivia 30 22 2 Caroline 29 23 1 Jodi 31 23 3 Penny 18 16 0 Jas 24 12 0 Vincent 18 14 2 Demetrius 27 29 0 Gus 37 14 0 Shane_JojaMart -200 -200 2/pause 850/showFrame Morris 39/viewport 54 34 true/skippable/viewport move 0 -2 4500/move farmer 0 -7 0 true/pause 5150/showFrame Morris 38/pause 300/emote Morris 16/pause 150/showFrame Morris 39/pause 800/showFrame Morris 8/playSound bob/pause 900/showFrame Morris 0/pause 500/speak Morris "Hello, @.$1#$b#A shipment of Joja materials was scheduled today. We're moving crates and boxes into the warehouse.$0"/pause 600/warp Shane_JojaMart 53 20/playSound doorClose/pause 450/faceDirection Morris 0/move farmer -1 0 0/move farmer 0 -2 0 true/pause 800/move Shane_JojaMart 0 1 2 true/pause 700/speak Shane "I moved all the crates off the truck, Morris.$0"/pause 500/speak Morris "Delightful! Thank you, Shane.$1#$b#You may take the rest of the day off.$4"/pause 300/emote Shane_JojaMart 16 true/pause 300/speak Shane "You serious!?$6#$b#Thanks!$1"/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/warp Shane_JojaMart -300 -300/viewport 54 25 true/pause 2000/question fork0 "#That was nice of you.#Why did you let him off early?"/pause 400/fork 6665290_ThatWasNice/move Morris 0 0 2/pause 400/speak Morris "Because I wanted to speak to you privately in the Joja warehouse.$0#$b#Come, there's much to discuss.$1"/switchEvent 6665290_JojaWarehouse
Entries.6665290_ThatWasNice: move Morris 0 0 2/pause 400/speak Morris "Shane's become my most trusted employee. He has grown within the Joja family.$1"/pause 900/showFrame Morris 34/pause 1200/showFrame Morris 0/pause 800/speak Morris "Join me inside the warehouse, @. I wish to discuss something with you.$0"/switchEvent 6665290_JojaWarehouse
Entries.6665290_JojaWarehouse: pause 500/move Morris 0 -4 2 true/pause 400/move farmer 0 -4 0 true/stopMusic/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 100/playSound doorClose/pause 700/playSound doorClose/pause 600/warp Jas -303 -303/warp Vincent -202 -156/warp Olivia -200 -200/warp Caroline -199 -199/warp Jodi -198 -198/warp Demetrius -197 -197/warp Penny -195 -195/warp Gus -150 -150/warp Morris 32 13/warp farmer 32 16/pause 200/changeLocation CommunityCenter/viewport 32 15 true/pause 2100/speak Morris "Corporate has been stockpiling materials and supplies in the warehouse for quite some time now.$4#$b#I am still surprised Mayor Lewis allowed us to buy it - signed the papers and all.$0#$b#But because he did, we now have a staging point for our next phase.$1#$b#I wonder what changed the Mayor's mind...$0"/pause 1000/move Morris 0 0 3/pause 800/move Morris 0 0 1/pause 1000/move Morris 0 0 2/pause 500/speak Morris "These crates and boxes...$0#$b#What you see before you is the future of Stardew Valley.$1#$b#With these materials, we can soon start paving a better life for everyone... literally.$4#$b#Miles of paved lit roads, next-generation housing, commercial zones, standardized plumbing, full electrical grids...$0#$b#Stardew Valley will finally become part of the developed world, and it's all thanks to your help.$1"/pause 300/emote farmer 32/pause 600/showFrame Morris 34/pause 800/speak Morris "Now... about the other local farmers and businesses.$0"/pause 1100/showFrame Morris 0/pause 500/shake Morris 400/pause 600/move Morris 0 0 0/pause 500/speak Morris "Erm...$2#$b#I must admit I was... incorrect in my approach towards the public when our branch first opened here.$2"/pause 700/move Morris 0 0 2/pause 800/showFrame Morris 32/pause 700/speak Morris "@, you...$2"/pause 500/shake Morris 600/pause 1200/showFrame Morris 0/pause 500/showFrame Morris 28/pause 600/playSound bob/showFrame Morris 29/pause 700/showFrame Morris 30/pause 500/playMusic musicboxsong/pause 500/speak Morris "You've accomplished incredible feats on %farm Farm, making national news, all while building up the community and respecting the environment.$8#$b#If you can do that... it's possible Joja can too. I'm inspired to take the same approach.$9#$b#What's the point of all this development if the very people meant to occupy it are cast off?$8#$b#That goes against my own goals of building a better Ferngill Republic.$7"/pause 1000/showFrame Morris 27/pause 1000/speak Morris "I have been going about this all wrong.$7"/pause 800/showFrame Morris 30/pause 500/speak Morris "The greatest challenge facing Joja is public relations. The current situation looks dire. The public's opinion of us has never been lower.$7#$b#Moving forward, I will seek resolution with the local businesses and established farms.$8#$b#I just need to think of a way to make amends.$9"/pause 1000/showFrame Morris 29/pause 600/playSound bob/showFrame Morris 28/pause 600/showFrame Morris 0/pause 1000/speak Morris "Would you care to brainstorm with me, @?$1"/pause 400/emote farmer 32/move farmer 0 -2 0 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1200/message "With Joja's help, the future of Pelican Town looks bright! Morris seems like a completely new person."/pause 1000/end dialogue Morris "I appreciate our conversation in the warehouse, @.$0"

Entries.502261/J/w sunny/H: sweet/-1000 -1000/farmer 53 34 0/broadcastEvent/addTemporaryActor Morris 16 32 -100 -100 2/skippable/pause 500/speak Morris "There he is, everyone! Look sharp!^There she is, everyone! Look sharp!"/specificTemporarySprite jojaCeremony/viewport 53 14 true/viewport move 0 1 8000/pause 9000/move farmer 0 -10 0/pause 4000/speak Morris "*Ahem*...$1"/pause 500/speak Morris "Just a few short years ago, the great innovaters at Joja Headquarters came up with a new idea, the Joja Community Development Project.$1#$b#The project was concieved as a way to provide important construction services to the beloved communities we hold so dear...*sniff*... all while generating substantial revenue!$1#$b#Pelican Town, with its run-down infrastructure, was a perfect testing grounds.$0"/pause 500/speak Morris "Well, thanks to you, our Community Development Pilot Program has been a major success!$1#$b#From repairing old bridges, to fixing buses, to turning piles of rubble into a greenhouse, we've really turned this town around!$0#$b#I've also received a big promotion! Hehehe.$1"/pause 1000/speak Morris "The president of the company asked me to give you this exclusive gift as a way of saying 'thanks'.$1"/playMusic none/pause 1000/awardFestivalPrize joja/null/itemAboveHead joja/null/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end Position 52 27/end

Entries.191393/Hn ccFishTank/Hn ccBulletin/Hn cc: junimoStarSong/-1000 -1000/farmer -100 -100 0 Evelyn 56 21 0 Lewis 52 33 0 Morris -2000 -2000 0 Jas 62 16 2 Vincent 46 23 1 Emily -2000 -2000 0 Gus -2000 -2000 0 Caroline -2000 -2000 2 Robin -2000 -2000 2 Demetrius -2000 -2000 0 Clint -2000 -2000 0 Pierre -2000 -2000 1 Jodi -2000 -2000 3 Gunther -2000 -2000 0 Willy -2000 -2000 0 Pam -2000 -2000 3 George -2000 -2000 2/broadcastEvent/addConversationTopic cc_Complete/specificTemporarySprite ccCelebration/animate Jas false true 90 16 17 18 19/animate Evelyn true false 500 17 18 17 19 19 19 19/viewport 53 25 true/viewport move 0 -1 8000/skippable/move Vincent 1 0 2/move Vincent 0 1 1/move Lewis 0 -9 0 true/move Vincent 8 0 0 false/pause 1000/jump Vincent/pause 1000/speed Vincent 4/move Vincent 0 15 0/pause 3000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/warp Lewis 32 22/warp Jas -2000 -2000/warp Evelyn -2000 -2000/warp Vincent -2000 -2000/warp Gunther 24 17/warp Gus 5 5 0/advancedMove Gus true -2 0 4 2000 4 0 4 3000 -2 0 4 2000/warp Pam 8 9/advancedMove Pam true 3 5000 1 0 0 -4 -1 0 4 1000 1 0 0 4 -1 0/warp Emily 16 19/advancedMove Emily true 2 0 2 8000 -2 0 4 3000/warp Pierre 23 10/warp Caroline 24 9/warp Jodi 25 10/warp Willy 40 10/advancedMove Willy true 2 0 4 3000 -3 0 4 3000 1 0 4 3000/warp George 42 18/warp Robin 10 25/advancedMove Robin false 1 0 2 2000 0 -13 16 0 0 -3/warp Clint 46 13/advancedMove Clint false -1 0 4 14000 10 0 0 6 7 0 0 -5/warp Demetrius 47 5/changeLocation CommunityCenter/viewport 7 10 true/viewport move 2 0 21500/pause 6000/move Lewis 0 -12 2/pause 10000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/warp farmer 32 20/move farmer 0 -9 0 true/viewport 32 10 true/pause 5000/speak Lewis "I'm not sure how you did it, @... but the community center has never looked better!$h#$b#You've done Pelican Town a great service. Everyone in town is pleased.$h"/pause 800/emote Lewis 32/pause 1000/speak Lewis "As a way of saying 'Thank You', I'd like to present you with this Town's greatest honor... The Stardew Hero Award. You've earned it!$h"/pause 1000/awardFestivalPrize hero/null/itemAboveHead hero/null/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 0/playMusic none/message "VOICE: Grumble... Grumble..."/pause 500/textAboveHead Lewis "Who's that?"/faceDirection farmer 2 true/move Lewis 1 0 2/move Lewis 0 1 2/pause 500/speak Morris "Sales have been plummeting!
